entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
